title: Save the Date connected script
content:
Hi Folks,

I was sent this sample and I have not been able to ID it. Seems like a pretty conventional script, but the S and D don't look familiar.

Does anyone here recognize this script?

Thanks,  
- Mike

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SaveDateScript_4421.gif)

Font: 

 Annabelle 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125626/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: **[Annabelle JF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125626/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jukebox/annabelle-jf/)** by Jason Anthony Walcott [JAW Fonts, 2002] now available from Jukebox Type

Thanks Fivos. That's it alright.

- Mike Yanega
